resources.string: This will test if the vibration motor on your phone is working. Once the test starts the vibration motor will start pulsing.
The vibration motor pulse now. Is the vibration motor working?
A generic test description. You really want to have something more descriptive here.
This test will display test patterns. Check if the pattern matches the description prompted before the pattern.
This test tests the proximity sensor. Press start and cover the top half of the phone completely with your hand.

This test checks if the ambient Light sensor is working properly. Perform this test in a bright environment and repeatably cover the top half of your Fairphone. The value read by the sensor should change from Light to Dark.
This tests checks if the camera is working. It will show you a preview of the camera picture. If you can see the preview than this test passes.
The display module houses the LCD screen and the touch sensors.
The receiver module contains joy and happiness and the front camera.
This module contains the modem, SIM-cards and more.
This module takes all those nice food pictures.
Rear speaker, vibration motor and USB-port: that is what you can find in this module.
This test checks if the rear speaker is working. Press start and make sure you hear the music playing.
You should hear some music playing. Is the rear speaker working?
This test checks if the USB port is working. Press start and plug and unplug the USB cable a few times.
